title: WATCH LIVE: ECB Press Conference
text:
WATCH LIVE: ECB Press Conference

Forex 30 minutes ago (Sep 12, 2019 08:12AM ET)

© Reuters. WATCH LIVE: ECB Press Conference Investing.com -- Watch the webcast live from Frankfurt, as European Central Bank President Mario Draghi explains why he's restarting quantitative easing and what the bank is doing to protect the region's banks from the negative side-effects of its latest interest rate cut, which takes the ECB's deposit rate to a new all-time low of -0.50%.

WATCH LIVE: ECB Press Conference
